experience: You and Troy both know Tom Serani, Michele Mickelson, and 7 others
General Manager Global Operations - AKA "Studio Producer"

Oversee the expansion of Weebly's business outside of the United States.  Manage the overall marketing,  messaging, and brand in key international markets. Create and test rapid marketing campaigns driven by data/analytics to identify messaging and positioning that drive new business. Manage multiple remote teams in the areas of marketing, customer support, business development and translation infrastructure. Own and manage the product to gain traction in key markets. Prioritize and actively manage development activities for the international engineering team.
Delivering patient leads to the pharmaceutical industry for clinical trials.
Mountain View, India, Singapore, Korea, Thailand, Philippines, Australia...

Set the growth strategy and manage all operations in the Asia Pacific region, the largest and most important growth region for Evernote. Responsible for continued growth in new user acquisition, retention and revenue. Oversee marketing efforts to drive leads, conversions and brand awareness. Manage a sales team focused on medium and enterprise business customers. Actively identify and execute strategic partnerships with key companies, organizations and governments. Develop key reseller partners throughout the region, including Apple, Google, Samsung and many regional distributors/systems integrators. Manage PR strategy, perform interviews with the press and deliver presentations at conferences on behalf of the company.

Responsible for structuring the company, directing the development of the online software application (SAAS) and managing the operations of the company on a day-to-day basis. Frequently consult with companies from varying industries and countries to structure effective teams and processes. Support the sales process of the Pelotonics project management solution into companies and institutions like GE, Warner Brothers, and MIT.  Company Management•	Established and managed an eight person development team in Chandigarh, India•	Created metrics that drive the performance of the business on a daily basis•	Managed the creation of the Pelotonics production management platform based on experience from Blue Sky Broadcast•	Created online marketing materials and a user experience with a 12.5% conversion rate•	Created educational materials related to production management and creating effective, scalable processes •	Utilized online video streaming for support resulting in a 97% customer approval rating•	Managed the P&L and drove the company to profitability with web-based marketing initiatives•	Speak at events on the subjects of production management, group productivity and technology
Served a two year mission to Seoul, Korea from 1991 to 1993. Returned to Korea with Samsung to conduct market research and analysis in 1995.
Served a two year mission to Seoul, Korea from 1991 to 1993. Returned to Korea with Samsung to conduct market research and analysis in 1995.

May 17, 2017, Troy was senior to Morgan but didn’t manage directly

Troy has been a powerhouse for our company. His experience, drive, clarity of vision, and followthrough are all second to none. He helped us pus through one of the most difficult projects I have ever worked on, and took our company from nowhere to somewhere in localization, translation, and international marketing. He personally handled difficult situations with aplomb, helped us find resources both internal and external to our company, and happily shared in the amazing results. I would happily work with him again and would gladly recommend him in the future.

I would definitely recommend Dilek to any organization looking to expand its customer base and raise the overall average sales price across an existing base of customers.

summary: I build and manage world-class teams at high-growth venture-backed companies to maximize market expansion and profitability. I'm an executive with twenty years of domestic and international business growth and management experience with enterprise and consumer SAAS software applications. Proven track record of developing and implementing strategy, process, and procedures that result in maximum scalability, customer and employee satisfaction and profitability.Specialties: P&L Management, Sales Team Recruiting and Management, Marketing, Creating Sustainable Technology Businesses Through Strategy and Execution, International Team Management and Operations, Product Management, Partnership and Corporate Development, Mergers and Acquisitions, Customer Service Organization Creation and Management, Budgeting and Forecasting
name: Troy Malone
title: General Manager Global Operations - AKA "Studio Producer" at All Turtles
